title.rendered: NEW Kerastase Blonde Absolu | You Dare, We Care

content.rendered:
So go ahead and dare to do it. Go blonde. Kerastase will  be there, on the other side, with the very best ultra-violet healing care.

Gone are the days where blonde hair women have to choose between caring for their hair or achieving that perfect cool tone and intense shine .. introducing Kerastase Blonde Absolu . Kerastase’ first personalised blonde routine to tone and care for your signature blonde #youdarewecare.

Conceived around the idea that blondes have infinite possibilities – there’s a different blonde for every woman, for every hair type, for every season, every mood. From ice queen to sun-drenched locks, buttery blondes and bright balayages, Kerastase Blonde Absolu promises to deliver tone correction, luminosity, strength and moisture, whatever your blonde may be.

Want to get your hands on Kerastase Blonde Absolu? Order Online and we will have it sent out you!

Discover the Kerastase Collection..

Bain Lumière

A hydrating and illuminating shampoo for all blonde hair types. Intensely hydrates fiber and removes impurities to illuminate hair. Provides the hair with a light feeling, deeply and durably hydrates the fiber, improves and illuminates natural shine, and leaves hair feeling light.

Ideal For: Hydration and Luminosity

Bain Ultra-Violet

An anti-brass, blonde perfecting shampoo, rich in violet pigments. Instantly neutralises brassy and yellow undertones to maintain cool blonde shades and bring shine. Perfect for toning orange to dark yellow undertones + grey hair, while restoring shine and softness.

Ideal for: Anti-brass action and maintaining cool blondes

Cicaflash Conditioner

An intense fortifying treatment designed for all blonde hair types. It is the ultimate hybrid: the restorative performance of a super masque, with the light weight finish on a conditioner.

Ideal for: Intense Shine and Strengthening 

Masque Ultra-Violet

An anti-brass blonde perfecting purple hair mask, that combines the power of neutralisation with an ultra caring treatment. Ideal for lightened, bleached or highlighted cool blonde hair.

Ideal For: Tone Correcting and restoring lightened hair

Cicaplasme

A heat protecting serum for all blonde hair types. Instantly heals the hair fibre while providing smoothness and lightness for flawless blonde hair.

Ideal For: Moisture, heat protection & healing damaged, blonde hair. 

Blonding has no limits when you have the right products to preserve the health of your hair. Not sure what products might be best for your blonde? Contact Us for a complimentary consultation!
